data.title: abhijit pandya: Latest News & Videos, Photos about abhijit pandya
data.meta_description: abhijit pandya Latest Breaking News, Pictures, Videos, and Special Reports from The Economic Times. abhijit pandya  Blogs, Comments and Archive News on Economictimes.com
data.text:
Skyrocketing coronavirus cases in India could eclipse the outbreak in America

With a gross domestic product last year of almost $3 trillion, India is the world’s fifth-largest economy and a crucial node in global supply chains. Despite the troubled state of its own medical system, it is by far the largest producer of both vaccines and the generic drugs that healthcare systems around the world rely upon.

08 Sep, 2020, 09:40 AM IST

Chinese Communist Party applies unfair means to hijack global order

Scholars recently gathered together to discuss the emerging threat to the world order by the Chinese Communist Party in a webinar titled ‘Chinese Communist Party: An Existential Threat to Humanity and the Rules-based World Order’.

24 Aug, 2020, 02:09 PM IST
